item.title: EP 708 - The Cursed Ghouls That Lost America
item.itunes:title: The Cursed Ghouls That Lost America
item.description:
Today we cast a cursed love spell, take a look at distressing film, and then take at a ghost story that has to be true!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-570-jason-fights-a-witch

https://archive.is/zNOTk#selection-1293.0-1293.50

Dead Rabbit Recommends The Strange Thing About The Johnsons

https://vimeo.com/155016328

The Strange Things About The Johnson's FULL MOVIE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQobOSv2kzM&ab_channel=Fluxufy

The Evil Within Trailer

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hb7VKgBYCdE&ab_channel=NewTrailerBuzz

A True American Fight: The Battle of Kings Mountain

https://www.thisiswhywestand.net/single-post/2019/10/17/a-true-american-fight-the-battle-of-kings-mountain

Haunted Places: The National Directory: Ghostly Abodes, Sacred Sites, UFO Landings and Other Supernatural Locations

https://www.amazon.com/Haunted-Places-Directory-Supernatural-Locations/dp/0142002348

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
